text: Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Totogi. Have you got what it takes?
text.1: Here=E2=80=99s some advice: If you=E2=80=99re just starting out your career, don=E2=80=99t join a company that is hesitant to update its technology from the 90s and adapt to new trends. Five years from now, your skill set will be dead in the water and your resume will be a non-starter.
text.2: In the telecommunications industry, Totogi is the main adversary to such companies. Totogi is disrupting this multibillion-dollar industry by introducing the world=E2=80=99s most advanced customer management system, which allows our enterprise customers to scale at an unprecedented pace. We=E2=80=99re looking for entry-level technicians to help us deliver this service to our customers.
text.3: Unlike in most companies, you won=E2=80=99t just sit around all day pulling tickets and wondering whether you=E2=80=99re doing them correctly. Instead, we=E2=80=99re actively invested in your growth and development, providing dedicated coaches who will help you build your skill set and launch your career.
text.4: If you have basic IT and data migration experience and want to hitch your career to a rocket, join Totogi=E2=80=99s technical delivery team!

li: Activating New Customers=E2=80=99 Services: Platform configuration for standard engagements or coding for customized engagements

text: Continual Learning: Totogi=E2=80=99s constant innovation gives you the opportunity to learn new technologies and platforms on a regular basis

li: Fixing outages or providing technical support for existing customers
At least 2 years of technical platform configuration experience
li.1: Experience with data migrations and basic knowledge of Python or R

text.5: Totogi is focused on building telco software for the public cloud and is completely redefining how carriers engage with their subscribers to drive customer love! We are a product-driven telco software company made up of some of the best minds from the telecoms industry and the brightest engineering talent across the globe. Change the game with us.
text.6: There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
text.7: This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

li: You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.

text: Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online =E2=80=9Cscreening=E2=80=9D assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.

text.8: If you do not receive an email from us:

li: First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
li.1: Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as =E2=80=9CNot Spam=E2=80=9D since you will receive other emails as well.
li.2: Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
li.3: If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
